The JavaScript

Importing modules

The JavaScript is written in ES6 Modules and the following modules are available to import from the toolkit.

Base

import base from 'path/to/node_modules/@pod-point/pod-point-ui-toolkit/dist/assets/js/modules/base';

Detects very basic but useful info about screen size and device:

window.isTouchDevice detects if touch device

Also adds a class to the body to identify if desktop or touch device .is-desktop or .is-touch

window.isMobileSize detects if window width is under 800px

window.isIE detects if browser is IE

window.isIE10OrBelow detects if browser is IE10 or below

Toggle Element

import toggleElement from 'path/to/node_modules/@pod-point/pod-point-ui-toolkit/dist/assets/js/modules/toggle-element';

This module is due to be refactored and merged with ToggleAccordionPanel

Toggle Accordion Panel

import toggleAccordionPanel from 'path/to/node_modules/@pod-point/pod-point-ui-toolkit/dist/assets/js/modules/toggle-accordion-panel';

This module is due to be refactored and merged with ToggleElement

Modal

import modal from 'path/to/node_modules/@pod-point/pod-point-ui-toolkit/dist/assets/js/modules/modal';

This module may also be refactored and merged with ToggleElement. However there is an example page on how to use it as it works currently here.

Accordion

import accordion from 'path/to/node_modules/@pod-point/pod-point-ui-toolkit/dist/assets/js/modules/accordion';

This module may also be refactored. However there is an example page on how to use it as it works currently here.
